title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.?
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

title: AGRIC-ECONOMICS & EXTENSION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and one of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) passes at 'A' Level in Biology /Zoology /Botany and any other Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit in Biology and any other Science subject.
(iii) NCE merit in Agriculture (Double Major).
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalents in English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science., Mathematics and another relevant subject.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or equivalent in Physics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any from Introduction to Agricultural Science, Materials and Workshop Process and Machining, Tractor Layout Power Unit Under Carriage and Auto Electricity; Transmission System; Implement and Machine; Principles of Crop Husbandry and Land Use, Materials and Workshop Processes; Construction and Maintenance of Agricultural Machines; general Metal Work; General Wood Work and Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Agricultural Education.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Biology/Agricultural Science, and any one (1) of Chemistry, Geography, Economics, Physics, Animal Husbandry and Fisheries.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in areas related to Agricultural Education.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any one (1) of Geography, Economics, Physics, Animal Husbandry or Fisheries.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANIMAL & ENVIRONMENTAL BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.

title: ANIMAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes or its equivalent in Chemistry and one of Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agriculture Science/Geography/Geology/Mathematics/Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agric Science and one of Physics, Geography or Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Mathematics /Physics.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, plus any one (1) of Government and Geography.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one of Physics, Biology/ Zoology/Botany and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: BOTANY & ECOLOGICAL STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUILDING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics, Chemistry and any one of Geography, Economics, Arts and Technical drawing. For holders of NTC,  the other relevant subjects could be Intro. to Building Construction, Bricklaying, Concreting, Walls, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Building/Engineering Drawing, Joinery, Carpentry, Gas, Steam Work and Bronze Welding, Cold  /   Hot Water Supply, Sanitation and Drainage.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Business Education

 

 

  1. At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at                GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in              relevant Business/Social Science subjects.
  2. At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in areas related to Business.
  3. In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) subjects from either Business/Social Science/Science.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.
(ii)           NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMMUNICATION ARTS
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ Level passes or equivalent in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or equivalent including English  Language, Literature in English, Arts/ Music depending on the combination.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or   Social Science subjects.

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Computer Education, Physics or Mathematics.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Physics and Mathematics;

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any Computer Science related courses.

 

HND in Computer, Computer Engineering or Computer related studies;

 

Bachelor of Science degree in any Computer Science related discipline.

 

 

In addition to UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2)  relevant subjects from Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Computer Science, Economics, Geography.
subjects:
Mathematics, Economics/
Commerce plus one (1) of Chemistry/Physics/Biology

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Pure Mathematics or Pure and Applied Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and 

English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: CROP SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied)...
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics....
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics

title: CURRICULUM STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or Nce merit including the relevant subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects chosen from Arts/Science.

title: DENTAL SURGERY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and one (1) other Science subject.

title: DOCTOR OF PHARMACY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics or Mathematics plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: DOCTOR OF PHARMACY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics or Mathematics plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Biology and any other science subject.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Biology and any other subject.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Biology.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any other two (2) sciences subjects.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in relevant science subjects including Chemistry.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Chemistry and any other science subject.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Chemistry.

 

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any other two (2) science subjects.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Economics and one (1) Social Science subject.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any Economics.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in Economics and one (1) other Social Science subject.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & EFIK/IBIBIO
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in relevant Arts subjects at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Merit pass at NCE in Efik or Ibibio.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English, Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
1. At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in English Language and any other relevant Arts subject at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.
  2. At least Merit pass at NCE in English Language and any other relevant Arts subject.
  3. At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in English Language.
  4.  In addition to UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English, Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & FRENCH
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in relevant Arts subjects including French at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in French

 

At least Merit pass at NCE in French.

 

At least a Merit grade in French in the University Proficiency Certificate programme (for 4-year programme)

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, French, Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: French plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Geography and one (1) Social Science subject.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in Geography.

 

 

At least NCE Merit grade in Geography and one (1) other Social Science subject.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Geography and two (2) other subjects.
subjects: Geography plus two (2) other Social Sciences/Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in History or Government and any other relevant Arts subject at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in History or Government.

 

NCE (at least Merit pass) in History or Government.

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, History or Government or Civic Education, Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & INTEGRATED SCIENCE
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Integrated Science or Science Education;

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in two (2) science subjects.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in any Science subject.

                              

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Mathematics and one (1) other science subject.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Mathematics and any other science subject.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Mathematics.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & MUSIC
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in any two subjects at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any  subject.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in Music.

 

Pass at Grade V or above in Local Examination in Music of the Associated Board of the Royal Schools in Music (ABRSM).

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) other subjects
subjects: Music and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Physics and one (1) other science subject;

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in relevant science subjects including Physics.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Physics.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, and any other two (2) science subjects.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION & POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Government or History and one (1) other Social Science subject.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in Government/History.

 

At least NCE Merit grade in Political Science and one (1) other Social Science subject.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Government or History or Civic Education, and two (2) other subjects.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

title: EDUCATION & RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Religious Studies and any other relevant Arts subject at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in Religious Studies.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in Religious Studies and any other relevant Arts subject.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Religious Studies, Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: EDUCATION & SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant Science subjects which should include candidates proposed course.

(ii)   NCE credit/merit in addition to TC II merit or 'O' Level credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Three (3) relevant Science or NBC subjects

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)  NCE in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii)Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalent to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in Government/History and one (1) other Social Science subject.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any Social Science discipline.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in Social Studies and one (1) other Arts and Social Science discipline.

 

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Government or History or Civic Education, and two (2) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject/NCE merit
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects including English Language, Mathematics and subject of specialization.
subjects: Subject of specialization and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION/FINE ART
de_requirements:
1. At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in relevant subjects including Fine Arts at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.
    2. At least Lower Credit pass at ND in Fine Arts.
    3. At least Merit pass at NCE in Fine Arts.
    4. In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics Fine/Visual Arts and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Fine Arts, one (1) other Arts subject and any other subject.

title: EDUCATIONAL TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
ND (at least Lower Credit) in the area of specialization.

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Educational Technology in addition to UTME requirements for that area of specialization

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB or its equivalent in each area of specialization and any other relevant subject

At least Merit grade at NCE in each area of specialization and any other relevant subject.

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes as applicable to each Area of Specialization.
subjects: Subjects as applicable to each Area of Specialization.

title: EFIK-IBIBIO
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or equivalent in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or equivalent including English Language and Efik.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: ELECTRICAL /ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Biology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one other subject

title: FINE & INDUSTRIAL ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Fine Arts/Technical Drawing and any one of Mathematics, Economics, Geography., Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

ND/HND credit in Fine Arts.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC  passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Fine Arts and two (2) other from social science subject.

Mathematics, Arts and one Social Science subject.

 

For  NTC  the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following: Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall Handling, Colour Mixing/

For NTC the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following: Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall Handling, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing; Graphic Painting; Ceramics; Basic Electricity; Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Fine Arts/Physics.

title: FISHERIES & AQUACULTURE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FISHERIES & AQUATIC ENVRIONMENT MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FOOD ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry. 

(ii) ND upper credit/ HND lower credit in relevant programmes.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: FOOD SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Physics/Agric Science/Botany/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics, Basic Catering and Food Services, Bakery and    Confectionaries, Hotel & Catering Crafty course (Cookery), Hotel & Catering Craft Course (Food /Drinks Services) and Basic Electricity.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics/ Physics and Biology/ Agricultural Science

title: FORESTRY & WILDLIFE
de_requirements: Two (2) ’A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology or Agric Science or Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and one of Physics, Economics, Further Mathematics and Statistics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: GEOGRAPHY & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes to include English language, Mathematics and Geography.
subjects: Geography and any Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any of; Mathematics, Physics Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) and Geography.

 

At least Credit Pass at ND in any of; Mathematics, Physics Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) and Geography.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language and Mathematics and any other three (3) subjects from Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Geography.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) of Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and Geography.

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: GEOPHYSICS
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any of; Mathematics, Physics Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) and Geography.

 

At least Credit Pass at ND in any of; Mathematics, Physics Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) and Geography.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language and Mathematics and any other three (3) subjects from Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Geography.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) of Mathematics, Physics Chemistry, Biology and Geography

title: GEOPHYSICS
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/Biology.
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.

title: GUIDANCE & COUNSELLING
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in relevant subjects.

 

At least NCE Merit grade in relevant disciplines.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any discipline.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any two (2) science subjects.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in Health Education related courses.

 

RN, and RM, Dip. In Public Health or Environmental Health Degree, ND or HND in Health related disciplines.

 

In addition to UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Health Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology/Health Science and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: HISTORY & INTERNATIONAL STUDIES
de_requirements: credit) in History/ Government and any other related subject.
utme_requirements: Five O'level credit passes in English Language, Government/History and any three subjects from the Arts or Social Sciences
subjects: Subjects from the Arts and Social Sciences.

title: HOME ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or equivalents in Chemistry and Biology/Botany/

Agricultural Science/Economics/

Physics/Mathematics/

Geography/Accounting.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics, Physics, English Language and any one of Nutrition, Fine Arts, Textile, Construction, Technical Drawing, Basic Electricity, Basic Catering and Food  Services, Bakery and Confectioneries, General Metal Work, Men Garment Construction and Finishing, Spinning,  Weaving, Surface Design and Printing, Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing, Ladies Garment Construction and Finishing.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Mathematics/Physics or one (1) Social Science subject.

title: HOME ECONOMICS & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in to Home Economics.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB in or equivalent in Science and Home Economics related subjects.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in areas related to Home Economics.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, and any one of Physics, Clothing/Textiles, Food and Nutrition, Home Management, Catering Craft Practice, Cosmetology, Fine Arts and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science and one (1) other subject.

title: HOME ECONOMICS AND EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    NCE merit in Home Economics

(ii) 'A' Level passes in two (2) of Chemistry or any Biology, Botany and Agricultural Science.
(iii) ND/HND credit in Home Economics or Food Science or Hotel and Catering Management or any other related programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language, Mathematics, Home Economics, Biology and Chemistry.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science and one (1) other subject.

title: HUMAN ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: HUMAN ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: HUMAN NUTRITION & DIETETICS
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any of; Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) Agricultural Science, Mathematics or Physics.

 

At least Credit Pass at ND in any of; Chemistry, Biology (Botany or Zoology) Agricultural Science, Mathematics or Physics.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language and Mathematics and any other three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology or Food and Nutrition or Agricultural Science and Physics or Mathematics.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) of Chemistry, Biology, Food and Nutrition, Agricultural Science, Physics or Mathematics.

title: HUMAN NUTRITION AND DIETETICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology and Physics plus the UTME requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: INDUSTRIAL TECHNOLOGY EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)   ND lower credit in Civil Engineering, Production/Electrical Engineering.

(iii)    Final City and Guilds or its equivalent plus National Technical Certificate.
(iv) NCE credit  in Technical Education plus 'O' Level credit passes in Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include Physics or Mathematics.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) other Science subject.

title: INSURANCE
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent from; Economics, Finance, Accounting or Management.

 

At least Upper Credit Pass at ND in any of; Economics, Finance, Accounting or Management.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at HND in any of; Economics, Finance, Accounting or Management.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language and Mathematics and Economics any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other Relevant subject

title: LAND & SURVEYING AND GEOINFORMATICS
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LIBRARY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any related subjects.

 

ND (at least Lower Credit) in Library Science or Information and Communication Technology.

 

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in relevant subjects;

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: LINGUISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE to include any Language, preferably an African Language.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any Language and two (2) other subjects.

title: MARKETING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Accounting, Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) other subject.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)        Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)       ND upper credit, NCE technical and HND in Mech. Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes   to include Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY
de_requirements:
(i) 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology in addition to the UTME requirements.

(ii) BSC, BOS, etc in relevant programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: MUSIC
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes  in any subjects at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB.


At least Merit grade at NCE or ND in Music.

Uyo accepts Certificate in Music from University of Uyo and other recognised Institutions into 100 level.

Uyo requires candidates to pass Audition Test
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' level credit passes in English Language and any other four (4) subjects.
subjects: Music and any other three (3) subjects.

title: NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics and English Language.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PETROLEUM ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes to include Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any one Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: PHILOSOPHY
de_requirements: Any two (2) ‘A’ Level passes.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and four (4) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: PHYSICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in any two (2) science subjects.

 

NCE at least Merit grade in Physical Education related courses;

 

ND in Physical Education  or related fields from recognized Institution;

 

Degree or HND in Allied Area like Microbiology, Parasitology.

 

In addition to UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology or Physical Education or Health Science and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PHYSIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: PHYSIOTHERAPY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: PRE-PRIMARY & PRIMARY EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in relevant subjects at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any discipline.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in relevant subjects.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: PSYCHOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts or Social Science

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: RADIOGRAPHY & RADIATION SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: RELIGIOUS & CULTURAL STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level subjects to include Religious Studies (CRS/IRS).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and CRS/IRS
subjects: CRS/IRS and any other two (2) subjects

title: SOCIOLOGY & ANTHROPOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts Subjects.

title: SOIL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agric Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes in relevant subjects at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any discipline.

 

At least Merit grade at NCE in relevant subjects.

 

In addition to UTME requirements
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) Subjects

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION with options in: Automobile/Metalwork Technology; Building/Woodwork Technology;  Electrical/Electronic Technology;
de_requirements:
At least Merit grade at NCE in Electrical/Electronic Technology.

 

At least two (2) ‘A’ level passes at GCE/NABTEB/IJMB/JUPEB or equivalent in relevant Technical and Science subjects.

 

At least Lower Credit Pass at ND in any Technical/Technology Education discipline.

 

HND in relevant Technology courses

 

In addition to UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, and any three (3)  relevant subjects from Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Electrical/Electronic subjects, Metalwork, Auto-Mechanics, Building Construction and Woodwork.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry.

title: THEATRE ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts, Social Sciences or Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i)      Two (2) A’ LEVEL passes in Geography and Mathematics

ND/HND upper credit in Town Planning or related programmes plus UTME requirements are accepted
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Art, History, IRK/CRK, Social Studies and Tech Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry.
